tasks.instructions: You should spend about 20 minutes on this task
tasks.description: The table below shows the salaries of secondary/high school teachers in 2009. Summarize the information by selecting and reporting the main features and make comparison where relevant.

images.altText: Table showing salaries of secondary/high school teachers

tasks.instructions: You should spend about 40 minutes on this task
tasks.topic: The tendency of news reports in the media to focus more on problems and emergencies rather than on positive developments is harmful to the individuals and the society as a whole. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
requirements: Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience.
